Package com.plexobject.service

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Lifecycle
    This interface defines lifecycle methods, which are used by service containers
    LifecycleAware
    This class is implemented by services to be notified when gatways are started/stopped.
    Pingable
    This interface defines ping method for services
    ServiceContainer
    This interface defines service containers that executes handlers
    ServiceHandlerLifecycleMBean  
    ServiceRegistryMBean  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractServiceContainer
    This is abstract class that provides helper methods for ServiceContainer interface
    ServiceConfigDesc  
    ServiceConfigDesc.Builder  
    ServiceHandlerLifecycle  
    ServiceRegistry
    This class defines registry for service handlers
